languages.text: "Когда нас поведут в бой? Невыносимо гнить тут без дела".
"When are they going to send us into battle? I can't stand just rotting away in here."
languages.original_text: "Когда нас поведут в бой? Невыносимо гнить тут без дела".

traits.locale_text: "When are they going to send us into battle? I can't stand just rotting away in here."
"When are they going to send us into battle? I can't stand just rotting away in here."
"When are they going to send us into battle? I can't stand just rotting away in here."
"When are they going to send us into battle? I can't stand just rotting away in here."
"When are they going to send us into battle? I can't stand just rotting away in here."
"When are they going to send us into battle? I can't stand just rotting away in here."

languages.text: «¿Cuándo van a enviarnos al combate? No puedo seguir pudriéndome aquí».
languages.original_text: "When are they going to send us into battle? I can't stand just rotting away in here."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cuándo van a enviarnos al combate? No puedo seguir pudriéndome aquí».

languages.text: “他们到底什么时候才会派我们上战场？我可不想天天在这里站着，人都要站烂了。”
languages.original_text: "When are they going to send us into battle? I can't stand just rotting away in here."

traits.locale_text: “他们到底什么时候才会派我们上战场？我可不想天天在这里站着，人都要站烂了。”

languages.text: 「いつ戦闘に送り込むつもりだろう？ここでただ腐っていくのは我慢がならない」
languages.original_text: "When are they going to send us into battle? I can't stand just rotting away in here."

traits.locale_text: 「いつ戦闘に送り込むつもりだろう？ここでただ腐っていくのは我慢がならない」

languages.text: "Wann werden sie uns in den Kampf schicken? Ich will hier drin nicht einfach verrotten."
languages.original_text: "When are they going to send us into battle? I can't stand just rotting away in here."

traits.locale_text: "Wann werden sie uns in den Kampf schicken? Ich will hier drin nicht einfach verrotten."

languages.text: « Quand vont-ils enfin nous envoyer au combat ? Je n'en peux plus de moisir là-dedans sans rien faire. »
languages.original_text: "When are they going to send us into battle? I can't stand just rotting away in here."

traits.locale_text: « Quand vont-ils enfin nous envoyer au combat ? Je n'en peux plus de moisir là-dedans sans rien faire. »

languages.text: "Bizi ne zaman savaşa gönderecekler? Beklemekten kuruyup kaldık."
languages.original_text: "When are they going to send us into battle? I can't stand just rotting away in here."

traits.locale_text: "Bizi ne zaman savaşa gönderecekler? Beklemekten kuruyup kaldık."
